QuestData.Title: Moose on the Loose
QuestData.Description:
There's been chatter around the hunters' lodge about a crazed moose that is terrorizing the basin.
I've never laid eyes on the beast myself, but they say its antlers are illuminated with magic.
Where other lesser hunters have tried and failed, you will prevail, and collect me a one-of-a-kind trophy!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the antlers of the cursed ancient spirit, Morashu.
QuestData.CompletionText: I'm looking forward to hanging the antlers of an ancient spirit within the walls of the hunters' lodge!
QuestData.RewardText: These antlers are going to look quite impressive hanging from the walls of the hunters' lodge.
